ch.ledcom.tomcat.interceptors

Class Metrics

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.ledcom.tomcat.interceptors.Metrics

  • public class Metrics
extends Object
    Reports metrics to a Statsd server.
    Author:
    gehel

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Metrics(String hostname, int port, String prefix, double sampleRate)
      Construct a reporter for a specific Statsd server.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean sample()
      Check if we should sample a specific method call.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • Metrics

        public Metrics(String hostname,
       int port,
       String prefix,
       double sampleRate)
        Construct a reporter for a specific Statsd server.
        Parameters:
        hostname - hostname of the Statsd server
        port - port of the Statsd server
        prefix - prepended to the key being reported
        sampleRate - ratio of metrics being actually reported

    • Method Detail

      • timing

        public final void timing(String key,
          long value)
        Report a timing metric to Statsd server.
        Parameters:
        key - key under which to report the metric
        value - time to report (in nanoseconds, even if Statsd expects milliseconds)

      • sample

        public final boolean sample()
        Check if we should sample a specific method call. As we don't want to impact performances too much, we only sample a given ratio of calls. Based on the sampleRate property, we decide if we wnat to sample this call.
        Returns:
        true if we should sample this call
